chunk:
Drunk Elephant Pekee Bar (2018 formulation)

Brand: Drunk Elephant

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Drunk Elephant

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Sodium Coco-Sulfate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Starch, Cetearyl Alcohol, Paraffin, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Honey/Mel/Miel, Glycerin, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract

Directions: Wet the Pekee Bar creating a creamy lather with your hands and massage over face, eyes and neck. Rinse thoroughly with warm water and pat dry. The Pekee Bar may be used day or night.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
